text:
@realDonaldTrump @CarnivalCruise @MickyArison Stop comparing #coronavirus to the flu

63,584 cases
1,483 deaths (2.3%)
10,584 serious (16.6%)

now... imagine flu case #’s for #COVID19

31 million (flu cases yearly)
713,000 deaths vs (12k - 61k flu)
4,960,000 serious vs (140k - 810k flu)

If it’s as contagious as the cold...
